ISSUE.TITLE: SubjectSet.as_vector() gives invalid result on unknown subjects
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I noticed that when a SubjectSet contains a concept that is not in the subject vocabulary, as_vector() returns a vector of ones.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Don't return a vector of ones when encountering unknown subjects. Fixes #202
Merge pull request #203 from NatLibFi/issue202-fix-subjectset-asvector Don't return a vector of ones when encountering unknown subjects. Fixes #202
